The app works great and the support in the discord is super helpful, and I get good preformance running these games. The only reason it is getting these low reviews is because:
A. Epic changing their APIs. Epic changed their login APIs and it temporarily broke login for a while, but instead of trying to get support people just leave a bad review.
B. People blame heroic for issues with wine, or no support for an anticheat on Linux. Games like valorant and fortnite will probably not work for a long time, and yet people leave a bad review because of it.
C. People leave bad reviews without trying to get support, which is very helpful, and has helped my fix a game on many an occasion. Overall, it has been a joy to use, and can't wait for the Heroic runner to be added soon. Thank you for you dedication, developers.
